Global Warming: Ihe Ị Kwesịrị Ịmara bụ ihe ngosi okpomọkụ ụwa nke afọ 2006, nke Nicolas Brown duziri, nke Tom Brokaw, James Hansen, Michael Oppenheimer, na Mark Serreze. Ihe nkiri ahụ na-elekwasị anya na mmetụta sitere na mgbanwe ihu igwe, Tom Brokaw na-agba ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị ajụjụ ọnụ
Ihe ngosi ahụ malitere na Discovery Channel, n'ubochi irí na isii n'ọnwa Julaị 2006.
